title: Tirta Gangga Water Gardens (Half-day)
overview: Wander through the beautiful Tirta Gangga Water Gardens, famous for its pools, fountains, and statues.

stops.description: Arrive and explore the gardens and pools.

title: Tirta Gangga & East Bali (Full-day)
overview: A full day exploring Tirta Gangga Water Gardens and nearby East Bali attractions.

stops.description: Arrive and explore the gardens and pools.
Visit nearby attractions such as Ujung Water Palace.
